CustomField.formula:
CASE(MONTH( Month__c ),
1, "January," + TEXT(YEAR(Month__c)) , 2, "February, "+ TEXT(YEAR(Month__c)), 3, "March, "+ TEXT(YEAR(Month__c)), 4, "April, "+ TEXT(YEAR(Month__c)), 5, "May, "+ TEXT(YEAR(Month__c)), 6, "June, "+ TEXT(YEAR(Month__c)), 7, "July, "+ TEXT(YEAR(Month__c)), 8, "August, "+ TEXT(YEAR(Month__c)), 9, "September, "+ TEXT(YEAR(Month__c)), 10, "October, "+ TEXT(YEAR(Month__c)), 11, "November, "+ TEXT(YEAR(Month__c)), 12, "December, "+ TEXT(YEAR(Month__c)), "None")
CustomField.label: Package Invoiced Month
